augments.name: Arcane Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Arcanist Emblem and a Swain.

augments.name: Arcanist Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Arcanist Emblems.

augments.name: Runic Shield I
augments.desc: Arcanists start combat with a shield equal to 300% of their Ability Power for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Runic Shield II
augments.desc: Arcanists start combat with a shield equal to 450% of their Ability Power for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Runic Shield III
augments.desc: Arcanists start combat with a shield equal to 600% of their Ability Power for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Spell Blade
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, Arcanists' next attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 225% of their Ability Power. Spell Blade's damage is considered Ability damage.

augments.name: Arcanist Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Arcanist. Gain a Swain.

augments.name: Ascension
augments.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

augments.name: Cutthroat
augments.desc: Assassins Mana Reave the first unit they attack, increasing their maximum Mana by 65% until they cast.

augments.name: Assassin Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Assassin Emblem and a Talon.

augments.name: Assassin Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Assassin Emblems.

augments.name: Smoke Bomb
augments.desc: The first time Assassins drops to 60% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding all negative effects. Any excess damage is reduced by 80%.

augments.name: Assassin Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Assassin. Gain a Talon.

augments.name: Band of Thieves
augments.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Binary Airdrop
augments.desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat.

augments.name: Shrug It Off
augments.desc: Bruisers regenerate 2.5% of their maximum Health each second.

augments.name: Bruiser Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Trundle.

augments.name: Bruiser Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Bruiser Emblems.

augments.name: Bruiser Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Trundle.

augments.name: Calculated Loss
augments.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing I
augments.desc: Your units heal for 12% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing II
augments.desc: Your units heal for 20% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 450 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing III
augments.desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 600 Health.

augments.name: Challenger Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Challenger Emblem and a Quinn.

augments.name: Challenger Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Challenger Emblems.

augments.name: En Garde
augments.desc: The first time an enemy is attacked by a Challenger, they are Disarmed for 3 seconds.

augments.name: Challenger Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Challenger. Gain a Quinn.

augments.name: Chemtech Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Chemtech Emblem and a Warwick.

augments.name: Chemtech Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Chemtech Emblems.

augments.name: Instant Injection
augments.desc: Chemtechs now additionally trigger their bonuses at the start of combat.

augments.name: Chemical Overload I
augments.desc: Chemtechs explode on death, dealing 20% of their max Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

augments.name: Chemical Overload II
augments.desc: Chemtechs explode on death, dealing 30% of their max Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

augments.name: Chemical Overload III
augments.desc: Chemtechs explode on death, dealing 40% of their max Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

augments.name: Chemtech Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Chemtech. Gain a Zac.

augments.name: Clear Mind
augments.desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

augments.name: Broken Stopwatch
augments.desc: 5 seconds into combat, all enemies and non-Clockwork units are frozen in time for 4 seconds.

augments.name: Clockwork Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Clockwork Emblem and a Zilean.

augments.name: Clockwork Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Clockwork. Gain a Zilean.

augments.name: Clockwork Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 2 additional Clockworks. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Armor Plating
augments.desc: Colossus become invulnerable for 2 seconds when their Health drops to 60% and 30%.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and 10 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and 20 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 350 Health and 30 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Exiles I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 30% maximum Health shield for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 45% maximum Health shield for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 70% maximum Health shield for 8 seconds.

augments.name: Stand United I
augments.desc: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Stand United II
augments.desc: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Stand United III
augments.desc: Your units gain 5 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Dominance
augments.desc: After winning your player combat, gain 1 bonus gold for every 2 surviving units.

augments.name: Ardent Censer
augments.desc: Allies healed or shielded by Enchanters gain 50% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat (maximum once every 4 seconds).

augments.name: Enchanter Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Enchanter. Gain a Taric.

augments.name: Enchanter Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 2 additional Enchanters. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Enforcer Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Enforcer. Gain a Vi.

augments.name: Enforcer Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 2 additional Enforcers. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Mutant Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Mutant Emblem and a Kassadin.

augments.name: Mutant Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Mutant Emblems.

augments.name: Mutant Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mutant. Gain a Kog'Maw.

augments.name: Featherweights I
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 25% Attack Speed and movement speed.

augments.name: Featherweights II
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 35% Attack Speed and movement speed.

augments.name: Featherweights III
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 55% Attack Speed and movement speed.

augments.name: First Aid Kit
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

augments.name: New Recruit
augments.desc: Gain +1 maximum team size.

augments.name: Golden Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 40% chance to gain a free refresh.

augments.name: High Roller
augments.desc: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 8 gold.

augments.name: Bodyguard Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Bodyguard Emblem and a Darius.

augments.name: Bodyguard Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Bodyguard Emblems.

augments.name: Stand Behind Me
augments.desc: Increases the Bodyguard Armor bonus by 25%. At the start of combat, Bodyguards grant 100% of their Armor bonus to non-Bodyguard allies directly behind them (does not stack).

augments.name: Bodyguard Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bodyguard. Gain a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: High End Shopping
augments.desc: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher.

augments.name: Hyper Roll
augments.desc: If you have less than 10 gold at the end of a round, gain 2 gold.

augments.name: Self Repair
augments.desc: When the Innovation dies, it will become untargetable and repair itself if an Innovator is still alive.

augments.name: Innovator Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Innovator.

augments.name: Innovator Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 2 additional Innovators.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item(s).

augments.name: Item Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random completed item(s) and a Reforger.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor I
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 35 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor II
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 55 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor III
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 75 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Level Up!
augments.desc: When you buy experience points, gain an additional 3. You can now reach level 10.

augments.name: Knife's Edge I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 50 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Mercenary Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Mercenary Emblem and 3 gold.

augments.name: Gold Reserves
augments.desc: Mercenaries deal 1% more damage per 1 gold you have. (Maximum +60%)

augments.name: Pirates
augments.desc: Mercenary units have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold when they kill an enemy.

augments.name: Mercenary Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mercenary.

augments.name: Mercenary Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 2 additional Mercenaries.

augments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
augments.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health at the end of each PVP round.

augments.name: Unstable Evolution
augments.desc: Mutants randomly gain one of the following when they reach 2 star: 500 Health, 30% Attack Speed, 30 Attack Damage, or 30 Ability Power. These bonuses stack.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 10 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Scholar Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Scholar Emblem and a Heimerdinger.

augments.name: Lifelong Learning
augments.desc: Scholars permanently gain 2 Ability Power after each combat, and an additional 2 if they survived.

augments.name: Scholar Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scholar. Gain a Zyra.

augments.name: Scholar Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 2 additional Scholars. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Junkyard
augments.desc: Gain a random component every 3 combat rounds with the Scrap Trait active.

augments.name: Scrap Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Scrap Emblem and a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: Scrap Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scrap. Gain a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: Scrap Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 2 additional Scraps. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: March of Progress
augments.desc: Gain 5 bonus experience points per round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

augments.name: Sniper Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem and a Tristana.

augments.name: Sniper Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Sniper Emblems.

augments.name: Sniper's Nest
augments.desc: Snipers gain +10% damage for each round fought from the same starting hex. (Maximum +40%)

augments.name: Sharpshooter
augments.desc: Twinshot's ranged attacks and Abilities can bounce once, dealing 45% less damage.

augments.name: Sniper Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sniper. Gain a Tristana.

augments.name: Duet
augments.desc: Summon 1 additional Socialite spotlight. Spotlighted units gain 400 Health.

augments.name: Share the Spotlight
augments.desc: Allies adjacent to a spotlight at the start of combat gain 100% of its bonuses.

augments.name: Socialite Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Socialite.

augments.name: Socialite Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 2 additional Socialites.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 20% of their maximum Health over 10 seconds and reduce healing received by 50%.

augments.name: Syndicate Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Syndicate Emblem and a Zyra.

augments.name: Syndicate Crown
augments.desc: Gain 2 Syndicate Emblems.

augments.name: One For All
augments.desc: When your Syndicates die, they grant your other Syndicates 20 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Payday
augments.desc: After winning your combat, gain 1 bonus gold for each surviving Syndicate.

augments.name: Syndicate Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Syndicate. Gain a Zyra.

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: Wise Spending
augments.desc: Gain 4 gold.Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 400 Health on kill.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
augments.desc: Your units heal 700 Health on kill.

augments.name: Titanic Force
augments.desc: Your units with more than 1400 maximum Health gain Attack Damage equal to 3% of their maximum Health.

augments.name: Ancient Archives
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

augments.name: Built Different I
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300 Health and 50% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Built Different II
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 400 Health and 60% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Built Different III
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 500 Health and 70% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Twinshot Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Twinshot. Gain a Kog'Maw.

augments.name: Twinshot Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 2 additional Twinshots. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Underdogs
augments.desc: Whenever your team has fewer units alive than your opponent, your units regenerate 9% of their missing Health each second (maximum: 150).

augments.name: Weakspot
augments.desc: Your units' attacks ignore 20% of the target's Armor and reduce healing received by 50% for 5 seconds.

augments.name: Windfall
augments.desc: Gain gold based on the number of augments you have now. 0 = 18g, 1 = 30g, 2 = 45g

augments.name: Woodland Charm
augments.desc: At the start of combat, your highest Health Champion creates a 1600 Health copy of themself (excluding items).

augments.name: So Small
augments.desc: Yordles gain 35% Dodge Chance.
